xml.body:
$md$ I doo remember thatt att sondry tymes mr Thawyttes sayde unto me
$mr Twaith Thawtes$ mr parkhurst : and I thynk lykewyse unto mr Schether thatt
we shuld styll from tyme unto tyme marke whatt was
prechyd : An say noo thyng butt note hytt : And nott dowt butt ther
wold be remedy ffor hytt : And he sayde. thatt / thys was
Mr Bakers cowncell : we schuld soo doo : : And now. I
doo perceyve thatt. I And I thynke other lykewyse : wyche
markyd : and were thus anymatt and sett a worke :
were butt Instrumenta malorum : Off thys examyn
yow mr parkhurst & mr schether
